titles.title: For the relief of certain members of the First Brigade Combat Team of the 34th Infantry Division of the Army National Guard.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Veterans' Affairs.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Economic Opportunity.

bill.summary:
10/3/2007--Introduced.
Provides for the relief of certain members of the First Brigade Combat Team of the 34th Infantry Division of the Army National Guard.
